• Always exclude other causes of seizures e.g. eclampsia or meningitis, even in a known epileptic.
• Treat status epilepticus as for non-pregnant women.
• Postpartum contraceptive choices must be carefully considered particularly for women on enzyme- inducing
anti-epileptic drugs (see chapter on family planning)
• Obstetric care, labour and delivery are the same as for non-epileptic women. Breastfeeding is not contra- 
indicated when the mother is on anti-epileptic drugs.
